content: pretty crochet coasters materials dk 8ply cotton or cotton blend 3mm hook note this pattern is written in uk terms method start with a magic_ring round 1 3ch counts as first treble_crochet 19tr into the ring 20tr join with a slip_stitch into the top of the starting 3ch round 2 3ch 1tr in the next st 2ch *1tr into the next 2 st 2ch repeat from * all round join with a slip_stitch into the top of the starting 3ch round 3 slip_stitch into the next 2ch space 3ch 1tr 3ch 2tr all into the first 2ch space *2tr 3ch 2tr into the next 2ch space repeat from * all round join with a slip_stitch into the top of the starting 3ch round 4 slip_stitch to next 3ch space 3ch 6tr into 3ch space *1dc between the treble_crochet cluster groups 7tr into the next 3ch space repeat from * all round join with a slip_stitch into the top of the starting 3ch abbreviations uk stitches / terminology chain = chain space = space st = stitch st s stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch double_crochet = double crochet treble_crochet = treble repeat = repeat © mary j stephens 2020
